title: Legal Pages - Schoox - A Learning Management System
content:
Schoox Legal Information

Below you can find the Schoox policies relating to terms of service, SLAs, acceptable use, privacy, GDPR and website cookies.

General Terms of service

The Terms of Service lay out the terms and conditions under which we provide services to you.

Service level agreement

The SLA defines our service availability goals and your remedies if we fail to meet those goals.

Acceptable Use Policy

The Acceptable Use Policy outlines the appropriate use and access of the Schoox system by its users.

Privacy Policy

The Privacy Policy explains how we handle your personal data as either a customer or a visitor to our website.

GDPR

The GDPR policy outlines how we secure and protect the personal data of those in the EU.

Cookie Policy

The Cookie Policy describes how we uses cookies to recognize you when you visit our site.

Copyright

The Copyright policy defines Schoox's proprietary right to its site content as well as information on how to file a complaint.

		CopyrightThe Copyright policy defines Schoox's proprietary right to its site content as well as information on how to file a complaint.
